long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Auto Refresh Chrome Extension
Effortlessly refresh web pages at your preferred time intervals!

🔥 Key Features:

🎲 Random Auto Refresh
- **Set a Range**: Choose a minimum and maximum time interval, and the page will refresh at random times within that range.

⏱️ Fixed Time Auto Refresh
- **Set Exact Times**: Pick a fixed refresh interval, and the page will reload at precisely that interval.

🚀 Automatic Start
- **Start with Browser**: The extension can automatically start refreshing pages when you reopen your browser.

⏳ Countdown
- **3-Second Countdown**: A short countdown before each refresh so you have time to save any changes before the page reloads.

👌 User-Friendly Interface
- **Easy to Use**: A clean, intuitive interface makes setting refresh intervals a breeze.

🔓 Enable/Disable with One Click
- **On-Demand Control**: Quickly turn auto-refresh on or off whenever you need.

Try **Easy Auto Refresh** today for simple, hassle-free page refreshing!
